Infiltrate.name: Infiltrate
Infiltrate.description: Your next Attack uses the target's Evasion as baseline when determining the thresholds for Heavy+ Hits, defaulting to the 5+ rule.

Swift Strike.name: Swift Strike
Swift Strike.description: When you take the Move action, you may make an Attack with a Light weapon.

Dirty Fighting.name: Dirty Fighting
Dirty Fighting.description: Your next Attack slices an exposed tendon or muscle on hit, either halving the target's Speed until the end of the round or giving it Bane(1) on its next Attack.

Wrangle.name: Wrangle
Wrangle.description: Your next Attack pulls the target adjacent to you if it's smaller than you, or pull yourself adjacent to it if it's larger than you. If you're the same size, you choose.

Lunge/Parry.name: Lunge/Parry
Lunge/Parry.description: Lunge: You gain Reach(2) for this Attack. Parry: You gain Guard(1)

Well Balanced.name: Well Balanced
Well Balanced.description: When rolling for your next #term[Attack], you add a third unique Attribute Die to the roll, picking two of the three rolled dice to use.

Adaptable.name: Adaptable
Adaptable.description: Until the start of your next turn, you treat a Weapon you're wielding as having one of the following tags, provided the weapon is not already tagged with it: Reach(2), Impact(1), Thrown(5)

Fencer.name: Fencer
Fencer.description: Step 1 Space without provoking Opportunity Attacks before or after making the Attack Roll. If you move directly towards the target, gain Boon(1) on the Attack Roll. If you move away from the target, prepare to counter, allowing you to Retaliate the next time someone moves into your Threat.

Can Opener.name: Can Opener
Can Opener.description: You may choose to attack the target's armor directly, without giving the target an opportunity to Retaliate.

Piercing Thrust.name: Piercing Thrust
Piercing Thrust.description: Your next Attack pierces all enemies in a line, using the same Attack Roll for each target.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.description: Your next Attack hits all Spaces within half of Reach, using the same Attack Roll for each target.

Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.description: Your next Attack hits three connecting spaces within the weapon's range, using the same Attack Roll for each target.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Your next Attack pushes the target 1 per success Spaces.

Ricochet.name: Ricochet
Ricochet.description: If your Attack hits, it bounces to a secondary target of your choice within half of the weapons range, dealing 1 damage.

Return.name: Return
Return.description: At the end of the current Phase the Weapon returns to your hand, dealing 1 damage to each unit it passes through on its way back.

Curved Shot.name: Curved Shot
Curved Shot.description: Your next Attack ignores the Cover of a target.

Twin Arrows.name: Twin Arrows
Twin Arrows.description: Your next Attack is made against two targets within the weapon's Range, using the same Attack Roll.

Piercing Shot.name: Piercing Shot
Piercing Shot.description: Your attack pierces all enemies in a line, using the same Attack Roll for each target.

Block.name: Block
Block.description: When hit by an attack roll, raise your Damage Thresholds by an amount equal to the Durable tag of this weapon.

Double Down.name: Double Down
Double Down.description: When you fail a roll you may Double Down, rolling again with a chance of turning failure into success. If this roll the consequences are doubled, and you can not Double Down again.

Protector.name: Protector
Protector.description: Enemies have Bane(1) to attack allies within your reach.

Valiant Aid.name: Valiant Aid
Valiant Aid.description: You may use the Protect Reaction on allies within your Speed, moving to a space adjacent to them.

Calculated Risk.name: Calculated Risk
Calculated Risk.description: When targeted by an attack, you may leave yourself open, giving the attacker Boon(1) on the attack. In return, the attacker is left open, granting all attacks against it Boon(1) until its next Phase.

Command.name: Command
Command.description: Command an ally to take a 1 AP action, spending 1 Focus instead of the regular cost.

Quick Thinking.name: Quick Thinking
Quick Thinking.description: Take an Action before your chosen Phase, paying the normal cost of the Action in addition to the Focus spent on this Ability.

Tactical Mind.name: Tactical Mind
Tactical Mind.description: When you choose to go methodical, gain 4 AP instead of 3.

Follow my Lead.name: Follow my Lead
Follow my Lead.description: Designate an ally who has chosen to be Methodical, moving them to the Rushed Phase while keeping their original AP.

Protectlier.name: Protectlier
Protectlier.description: When you take the Protect Reaction, you may take the entire chunk of damage, instead of splitting it with the ally you're protecting.

Back to back.name: Back to back
Back to back.description: While adjacent to an ally with this ability, neither can be flanked.

Climber.name: Climber
Climber.description: Gain Boon(1) on attempts to climb and hold onto vertical surfaces and overhangs.

Hittable face.name: Hittable face
Hittable face.description: Goad an enemy into trying to attack you instead of an ally.

Joust.name: Joust
Joust.description: Roll a contested attack roll when passing an enemy, the highest attack resolves and the winner gets an attack of opportunity.

Degraded focus.name: Degraded focus
Degraded focus.description: On spending focus, you may choose to instead corrupt the same amount of focus.

Batter.name: Batter
Batter.description: Units taking Knockback within your Threat trigger your Attack of Opportunity. When you Retaliate with this feature, you may add +1 Knockback to the target and redirect the remaining Knockback on the target.
